data.caption: pigeon
data.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.

data.caption: peacock
data.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

data.caption: duck
data.quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.

data.caption: hedgehog
data.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
